text: Fabien Eboussi Boulaga (17 January 1934 – 13 October 2018) was a Cameroonian philosopher. He was born in Bafia, Cameroon. He was ordained as a priest in 1969, and became an official member of the Society of Jesus in 1973. He became known for his book Bantou problématique (1968). Boulaga was a professor at the University of Yaoundé.
